afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts

Class ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint<O extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.ERTMemoryLessPoint
      • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Type of data contained in the point.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPoint<java.lang.String>, ITrainingPoint<java.lang.String,O>, java.io.Serializable

    public class ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint<O extends java.io.Serializable>
extends ERTMemoryLessPoint
implements ITrainingPoint<java.lang.String,O>
    Creates a memory less training point that stores a reference to the labels of the signal and return the value of the right label upon query. Do not modify the labels arrayList as only a reference to it is stored.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint

        public ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint(int index,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> signalFeatures,
                          java.util.ArrayList<O> labels)
        Creates a memory less training point.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the point to query values for.
        signalFeatures - features over the whole signal. The value of the feature corresponding to the index will be returned upon query.
        labels - List of all labels, the value of the label at the index will be queried when requested.

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

      • getMemoryLessTrainingPoints

        public static <O extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.ArrayList<ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint<O>> getMemoryLessTrainingPoints(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> features,
                                                                                                              java.util.ArrayList<O> labels)
        Return an ArrayList of MemoryLessTrainingPoints created using the given HashMap of features and labels (point are in the same order as the MultiSignal).
        Type Parameters:
        O - Type of data contained in the point.
        Parameters:
        features - HashMap containing the features to create the MemoryLessTrainingPoints with.
        labels - labels used for the MemoryLessTrainingPoints (must be in the same order as the feature values).
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of MemoryLessTrainingPoints created using the given features and labels.
